QuestData.Title: Cleaning Up Gul'var
QuestData.Description: Khadgar wants you to concentrate on Gul'dan, but that doesn't mean we're not going to take down the Shadow Council in the process.$B$BGul'var's filthy with Shadow Council villains. Let's do something about them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Shadow Council orcs at Gul'var.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need to nip the Shadow Council in the bud while their numbers are still low on this world.
QuestData.RewardText: Every world is better off without those demon-loving scum.
